artifact.title: Skeleton coordinates
artifact.description: Ivy coordinate to the J2EE Container, Azkaban or Samza container. See http://go/topologyspec for details.

name.title: Application name
name.description: Name of the application to deploy. See http://go/topologyspec for details.

kind.title: Container type
kind.description: Application container type (e.g. jetty, tomcat, generic, samza). See http://go/topologyspec for details.

meta.title: Optional metadata
meta.description: Metadata such as deployment features (e.g. cfg2). See http://go/topologyspec for details.

protocol.title: Transfer protocol
protocol.description: Whether to use HTTP or HTTPS for deployment

instance.title: Application instance
instance.description: Application instances to deploy (e.g. i001). See http://go/topologyspec for details.
